name: PARADISE CLEANING - Married Woman Cosplay Life
name_original: PARADISE CLEANING - Married Woman Cosplay Life
description:
Paradise Cleaning! - Married Woman Cosplay Life - is a very simple action game.
The object of the game is to clean all the trash icons in the stage within a time limit.
There are 5 + 1 different trash icons, each of which can be cleaned with the corresponding cleaning tool.
[character-introduction]
Name: Misuzu Kagohara
Height: 164cm
Three sizes：B124/W61/H93
Characteristics: gentle, serious, natural
She is a kind and gentle wife, who is disgusted by her husband's hobby of costume play sex, but tries her best to cooperate with him.
Features
Easy-to-play design
20 stages
20 adult CGs
11 Achievements
